channel.title: Evil Faction - Vampire
channel.description:
First, we will have [details=Vampire Lord] **<Big>[color=4d4d4d]Vampire Lord[/color]</big>**
**[color=4d4d4d]Vampire Special[/color]**
**Blood Connect (Passive)** - All **[color=4d4d4d]Vampire[/color]** can hear you and see your action but can't speak up. Oldest **[color=4d4d4d]Vampire[/color]** take your place if you die.
**Vampire Lust (Passive)** - Your Faction have no members limit.
**Bat (Day)** - Bleed a player. [3 Use]
**Vampire Energy (Day)** - Occupy a player tonight. [1 Use]
**Bite (Night)** - Convert a target player, if they are convert immune, attack them instead. Can't target people you have learned to be convert immune. [Unlimited Use]
**Blood Ritual (Night)** - Occupy all **[color=4d4d4d]Vampire[/color]** and attack a target player. [Unlimited Use] [/details]
Then: [details=Vampire] **<Big>[color=4d4d4d]Vampire[/color]</big>**
**[color=4d4d4d]Vampire Special[/color]**
**Hidden (Day)** - Appear as Not Vampire to the **[color=2A7AFC]Vampire Hunter[/color]** tonight. Not use if Occupied. Disable **Harden** if this is used. [1 Use]
**Harden (Night)** - Grant yourself Death Immune tonight. Disable **Hidden** if this is used. [1 Use] [/details]
And ofc, a counter class
[details=Vampire Hunter] <Big>**[color=2A7AFC]Vampire Hunter[/color]**</big>
**[color=2A7AFC]Unique BD Killer[/color]**
**Blood Hunt (Passive)** - Immune to Convert. Immune to attack from **[color=4d4d4d]Vampire Lord[/color]** once.
**Silver Ring (Day)** - Grant a player Convert Immune for the night. [2 Use]
**Blood Test (Night)** - Check if a player is **[color=4d4d4d]Vampire[/color]** or **[color=4d4d4d]Vampire Lord[/color]**. If they are, attack them. Your attack will be unhealable. [Unlimited Use]
**Follow (Night)** - Follow a player, if they visit **[color=4d4d4d]Vampire[/color]**, attack the **[color=4d4d4d]Vampire[/color]**. [Unlimited Use] [/Details]

Vampire Hunter

Unique BD Investigate

Blood Hunt (Passive) - Unaffected by Vampire Lord ’s abilities. If the Vampire Lord visit your target at the same night, you will occupy and attack Vampire Lord .

Silver Ring (Day) - Grant a player Convert Immune for the night. [2 Use]

Blood Test (Night) - Check if a player is Vampire or Vampire Lord . If they are, attack them. Your attack will be unhealable. [Unlimited Use]

Follow (Night) - Follow a player, if they visit Vampire , attack the Vampire . [Unlimited Use]

This thing completely shuts down Vampires as an evil faction.
